segments.text: I see the woman drying dishes, and it’s almost funny how oblivious she is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out of the sink, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are being so clever, sneaking cookies while she’s distracted.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool, and it’s wobbling like crazy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope he doesn’t fall, but it’s kind of entertaining to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, looking so innocent.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is like a comedy of errors, with everyone missing the obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor is getting wetter by the second, and no one seems to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so peaceful, like nothing is wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think this moment is going to end badly, but it’s still funny to watch.
segments.speaker: PAR
